title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, exposing chat, embed, and tool-calling interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chat, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama featuring REPL, syntax highlighting, and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and docker-compose examples for CPU & GPU deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions into channels and DMs.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a backend for Claude Desktop & friends.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spin up Ollama containers for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library for Ollama with generated OpenAPI bindings.
